Warhead: Aerial recon, I want a report now! (He turns to Drillbit) 
Drillbit, move your bugass now! We begin a sweep of the area as soon 
as I have the sitrep, so be ready!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > He makes his way out of the ship. Using his internal compass, he 
moves
> > towards the east.
> >
> > Warhead: Inferno, Rage, I want you to make an aerial recon first.
> > There were reports about an armed group. Do not engage before I 
tell
> > you. Drillbit, Nightshade, you two stay with me.
> >
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Nightshade moves into a flanking position a small ways behind 
Warhead
> reamining in her beast form as they scout. Her eyes watching and 
marking
> well their route. She honestly wondered what Megatron wanted on this 
mud
> ball of a planet, there had to be more exciting and profitable 
places to
> crash a stolen maximal frigate, so why here?
> 
>     History wasn't her strong suit but she heard enough boasting and
> bragging to know this planet was a key one in the line of Megatron 
but why
> this time? Something had to be here that would benefit him and if it 
would
> benefit he, then it stood to reason she should lay her hands on it 
first.
> 
>     Smiling as she eyed Warheads back she saw where the lines were 
being
> drawn, the weak were already bending over backwards for their 
"leader" and
> would likely make their own plays in due course. The bot had 
questioned her
> true predicon heritage. Heh if only the tin plated fool knew, course 
he
> wouldn't til she killed him, but he'd know the truth of the matter.
> 
>     She grinned, she was as devious as the rest but then she has had
> centuries to perfect it. She'd dance the line and play these power 
hungry
> fools off each other, all to her gain. As it should be.
